sentences.cn: 技巧娴熟的足球运动员

sentences.en: He is widely regarded as Hungary's most skilful politician.
sentences.cn: 他是公认的匈牙利最有手腕的政治家。

sentences.en: He's not very skilful with his chopsticks [ at using chopsticks ] .
sentences.cn: 他用 筷子 不大熟练.

sentences.en: Her skilful fingers spun the wool out to a fine thread.
sentences.cn: 她那灵巧的手指把羊毛纺成了细毛线.

sentences.en: I am in variously skilful hands.
sentences.cn: 我读过各种各样巧妙的作品.

sentences.en: I complimented her on her skilful performance.
I'm skilful in ink and wash.
My old brother is a skilful paddler.
sentences.cn: 我哥哥是个技术娴熟的桨手。

sentences.en: Skilful men, of the medical and chirurgical profession , were of rare occurrence in the colony.
sentences.cn: 当时在殖民地,精通内外科医术的人尚不多见.

sentences.en: So ended a successful and skilful campaign of thirty - eight days.
sentences.cn: 这次成功的和巧妙的持续 三十八 天的战役就此结束.

sentences.en: The girl had grown more skilful with the sewing - machine.
sentences.cn: 那女孩已能更熟练地使用缝纫机了.

sentences.en: They tired out the enemy by skilful manoeuvre.
sentences.cn: 他们施巧计拖垮了敌人.

sentences.en: This painting is the work of a master hand, ie a superior and skilful artist.
You are a skilful pilot, you will weather the storm.
sentences.cn: 你是个熟练的领航人, 一定会冲过大风暴.

sentences.en: You'll get more skilful at this job as you go along.
sentences.cn: 过些时候你会对这个工作更加熟练.

words.tran_cn: 熟练的；有技能的；需要技能的
（英）熟练的；灵巧的；技术好的（等于skillful）

trans.tran_cn: 灵巧的，熟练的，技术好的
trans.tran_en: good at doing something, especially something that needs special ability or training
